short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notify when you have new email in your GMail accounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get notified by our software extension when you have new emails in your gmail account.

This software alerts you whenever you get a new email inside Gmail. Its extremely easy to use and 100% free.

Dont bother having a tab in Gmail open as our software will automatically ping you when you get a new email today.
